title: Explore
lyrics:
Sorry for the noise
Cause you can hear us loud and clear
And I know you'll explore with me
Sometimes you got to take a pill
Knocking at my door

Can we turn it down - no no

Can't distract this flow

Waking at the scene

Whenever you with me

Oh - you sound amazing



Got you singing so loud

Play my speakers

Making love right now

We can turn it up, we can turn it up

Got the room like

Boom Boom Pow



In Ibiza

And we going up

Feeling ??

Let me know wassup

They just like it though

Bumping like a truck

Give you what you need

Ain't that what you want?



Got you singing so loud

Got the room like

Boom Boom Pow



Just keep it quiet in the suites

We gon' turn it up before we leave

We gon' cause a scene if they try and kick us out

We don't pay if they don't like the noise



So they

Knocking at my door

Can we turn it down - no no

Can't distract this flow

Yeah Yeah Yeah

Waking at the scene

Whenever you with me

Oh - you sound amazing



Got you singing so loud

Play my speakers

Making love right now

We can turn it up, we can turn it up

Got the room like

Boom Boom Pow



In Ibiza

And we going up

Feeling ??

Let me know wassup

They just like it though

Bumping like a truck

Give you what you need

Ain't got what you want



Got you singing so loud
